Siinc is an experiential marketing, communications and production company redefining excellence in audience engagements, delivering award-winning creative and strategic solutions for leading Fortune 500 brands. •	Marketing Strategy and Activation•	Sponsorship Negotiation, Management and Activation•	Event Design, Production and Management•	PR Support•	Conferences and Exhibitions•	VIP and Hospitality Programs•	Product Launches and Road Shows•	Internal Communications and Employee Incentive Programs•	Corporate Social ResponsibilityOur boutique style is genuine, professional, and relevant, combining industry knowledge and experience with flexibility, reliability and a passion to succeed in producing events that exceed expectations.SiiNC Agency is Full Service Marketing Events Agency that is 100% minority owned & operated.Our clients include: ADT, Audi, Bacardi, Conde Nast, Conill Advertising, Discovery Networks, DHL, Express, Facebook, Fendi, InStyle Magazine, Lacoste, MasterCard, Microsoft, Montblanc, Omega, Rubell Family Collection, Sony Pictures Television, Tiffany & Co, Toyota, Turner Broadcasting, UGG Australia, VW and Wayra (a Telefonica company).

It is an absolute pleasure to work with Maggie as one of her trusted agencies. She has an incredible vision and ability to manage multiple projects without loosing perspective of where the business is. Challenging and at the same time letting the agency do their work in the best possible way. She's beyond supportive and never ceases to amaze me with her deep understanding of the many levels involved in a great experiential marketing program. Not only is a she a great professional with an incredible experience and knowledge, she's also a visionary willing to go the "new" routes in order to achieve success for a program. She lets the agency do their job, guiding through out the process. A great professional and a wonderful client. We are lucky to work with her!

summary: Cross-cultural marketer and communicator with expertise in the Domestic, Latin American and US Hispanics markets.
